</head>
<body class="article">
<div id="header">
<h1>git-lfs-pointer(1)</h1>
</div>
<div id="content">
<div class="sect1">
<h2 id="_name">NAME</h2>
<div class="sectionbody">
<div class="paragraph">
<p>git-lfs-pointer - Build, compare, and check pointers</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="sect1">
<h2 id="_synopsis">SYNOPSIS</h2>
<div class="sectionbody">
<div class="paragraph">
<p><code>git lfs pointer --file=path/to/file</code><br>
<code>git lfs pointer --file=path/to/file --pointer=path/to/pointer</code><br>
<code>git lfs pointer --file=path/to/file --stdin</code><br>
<code>git lfs pointer --check --file=path/to/file</code></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="sect1">
<h2 id="_description">Description</h2>
<div class="sectionbody">
<div class="paragraph">
<p>Builds and optionally compares generated pointer files to ensure
consistency between different Git LFS implementations.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="sect1">
<h2 id="_options">OPTIONS</h2>
<div class="sectionbody">
<div class="dlist">
<dl>
<dt class="hdlist1"><code>--file</code></dt>
<dd>
<p>A local file to build the pointer from.</p>
</dd>
<dt class="hdlist1"><code>--pointer</code></dt>
<dd>
<p>A local file including the contents of a pointer generated from another
implementation. This is compared to the pointer generated from <code>--file</code>.</p>
</dd>
<dt class="hdlist1"><code>--stdin</code></dt>
<dd>
<p>Reads the pointer from STDIN to compare with the pointer generated from
<code>--file</code>.</p>
</dd>
<dt class="hdlist1"><code>--check</code></dt>
<dd>
<p>Reads the pointer from STDIN (if <code>--stdin</code> is given) or the filepath (if
<code>--file</code>) is given. If neither or both of <code>--stdin</code> and <code>--file</code> are given,
the invocation is invalid. Exits 0 if the data read is a valid Git LFS
pointer. Exits 1 otherwise.</p>
</dd>
<dt class="hdlist1"><code>--strict</code></dt>
<dt class="hdlist1"><code>--no-strict</
